alert.note: Alert for Wagoner (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 14 at 7:44AM CDT until July 14 at 8:15AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM CDT FOR ROGERS...NORTHWESTERN MAYES AND NORTH CENTRAL WAGONER COUNTIES... At 744 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles east of Talala to 3 miles southeast of Oologah to 3 miles southeast of Collinsville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Claremore... Owasso... Catoosa... Verdigris... Chelsea... Inola... Oologah... Adair... Foyil... Talala... Taiwah... Tiawah... Bushyhead... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 235 and 272. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
